Rule.Name: PartialArrayContains

Rule.Name: Contains

Rule.Name: CaseInsensitiveStartsWithOrStringEquals
Rule.Description: [CDATA["Query uses case-insensitive string search functions STARTSWITH or StringEquals."]]

Rule.Name: CaseInsensitiveEndsWith
